thread.title: Shoe Maker Rockport Seeks Bankruptcy Protection

author: Becky Yerak
title: Shoe Maker Rockport Seeks Bankruptcy Protection
text:
Comfort shoe maker Rockport Co., citing “today’s evolving retail landscape” and a costly separation from former owner Adidas AG, has filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy with a plan to hand ownership to private-equity firm Charlesbank.
Rockport was founded in 1971 and supplies its shoes to department stores and specialty retailers, as well as online and at some of its own stores, in more than 60 countries, according to court filings in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del.
